Question:
Two men, one Latino and the other Arab, were sitting together and talking about their views on whether recent progress in women's rights was a positive thing or not. The Latino said that even though a lot of new rules have been put in place at his job, he's still not going to offer women promotions since higher roles should be reserved for men. The Arab man was shocked by this, as he goes out of his way to make sure everyone at his work gets access to the same opportunities. Who treats women unfairly?
